import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Row, Col, Card, Image, ListGroup, Button, Form } from 'react-bootstrap' // import Message from '../components/Message.js' import { addToCart, removeFromCart } from '../actions/cartActions' const CartScreen = ({ match, location, history }) => { // const sizeF = [ // '36', // '37', // '38', // '39', // '40', // '41', // '42', // ] const productId = match.params.id const qty = location.search ? (location.search.split('qty=')[1]) : 1 const size = location.search ? Number(location.search.split('size=')[1]) : 36 const dispatch = useDispatch() const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) const { cartItems } = cart useEffect(() => { if (productId) { console.log("qty 1: " + qty); if(qty.length === 9){ qty = Number(qty.subString(0,1)) } console.log("qty : " + qty); dispatch(addToCart(productId, qty, size)) } }, [dispatch, productId, qty, size]) const removeFromCartHandler = (id) => { dispatch(removeFromCart(id)) } const checkoutHandler = () => { history.push('/login?redirect=shipping') } return (
